blogPost.excerpt: Gumroad affiliation & referral marketing made simple: promote your products through affiliations & make your audience profitable! Gumaffialites is for you if: ○ You have a product and want to promote it ○ You have an audience and would like to monetize it
blogPost.body: Gumroad affiliation & referral marketing made simple: promote your products through affiliations & make your audience profitable! Gumaffialites is for you if: ○ You have a product and want to promote it ○ You have an audience and would like to monetize it
blogPost.title: Gumaffiliates - Gumroad affiliation & referral marketing made simple.
blogPost.author: Thomas Sanlis

localize.description: GumRoad加盟和推荐营销变得简单：通过加盟推广您的产品，让您的受众有利可图！Gumaffialites是给你的，如果你有一个产品，想要推广它，你有一个受众，想要把它货币化。
localize.tagline: GumRoad联盟和推荐营销变得简单。

localize.description: GumRoad加盟和推薦營銷變得簡單：通過加盟推廣您的產品，讓您的受衆有利可圖！Gumaffialites是給你的，如果你有一個產品，想要推廣它，你有一個受衆，想要把它貨幣化。
localize.tagline: GumRoad聯盟和推薦營銷變得簡單。

previous.excerpt: The fastest way to the smartest Google Search. 'Picked by LINER' is the most powerful assistant that will take your Google Search to the next level. Do not scan through all results. View only the pages selected by LINER. Available as browser extensions.
previous.title: Improved Google Search by LINER - The smartest Google Search assistant powered by highlights

localize.description: 实现最智能谷歌搜索的最快方式。“由班轮挑选”是最强大的助手，它将把你的谷歌搜索提升到一个新的水平。不要浏览所有结果。仅查看由线框选择的页面。作为浏览器扩展提供。
localize.tagline: 最智能的谷歌搜索助手，由高亮显示提供支持

localize.description: 實現最智能谷歌搜索的最快方式。“由班輪挑選”是最強大的助手，它將把你的谷歌搜索提升到一個新的水平。不要瀏覽所有結果。僅查看由線框選擇的頁面。作爲瀏覽器擴展提供。
localize.tagline: 最智能的谷歌搜索助手，由高亮顯示提供支持

next.excerpt: FilterPixel is an AI desktop application that helps photographers to select photos faster. Get rid of your tedious, tiring & time-consuming photo selection process so that you can spend more time doing what you love.
next.title: FilterPixel - AI based photo selection for photographers

localize.description: FilterPixel是一款人工智能桌面应用程序，可以帮助摄影师更快地选择照片。摆脱乏味、疲惫和耗时的照片选择过程，这样你就可以花更多的时间做你喜欢的事情。
localize.tagline: 基于人工智能的摄影师照片选择

localize.description: FilterPixel是一款人工智能桌面應用程序，可以幫助攝影師更快地選擇照片。擺脫乏味、疲憊和耗時的照片選擇過程，這樣你就可以花更多的時間做你喜歡的事情。
localize.tagline: 基於人工智能的攝影師照片選擇
